entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
